title: The Moon Landing
summary: On July 20, 1969, Apollo 11 astronauts Neil Armstrong and Buzz Aldrin became the first humans to land on the Moon.
details: The Apollo 11 mission was a significant milestone in space exploration. Neil Armstrong's first steps were broadcast to millions, marking the achievement with the words: 'That's one small step for man, one giant leap for mankind.' The mission showcased technological advances and inspired generations.

timeline.event: Apollo 11 launches from Kennedy Space Center.
Lunar Module lands on the Moon.
